item.title: Orchestrate with Okta Workflows
item.description: Okta Workflows Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 756 Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Internal app builders Description: A developer’s introduction to Okta Workflows, what it is for, what problems it solves, and how developers write code against it (if at all). Are there any connections with SCIM and LCM applications and therefore the OIN for example?

item.title: Hooks
item.description: Inline and event hooks Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 758 Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal app builders Description: An overview of event and inline hooks, what they are, and some basic use cases. Establish the difference between hooks and the Workflows platform, and then provide a link to the more detailed “How to Implement a hook section” (ID: 660)
